nodes.text: The High Castle on Jomark had been built by the original inhabitants of Jomark, who had long-since vanished by the time of the Galactic Civil War. It was a short, dirty building with sometimes ill-fitting stonework, built on what was left of a volcanic cone overlooking Ring Lake 400 meters below in the center of the cone's crater.
The High Castle was the building Joruus C'baoth used as his residence while he awaited the arrival of Luke Skywalker during the Thrawn campaign.
